alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Nephi, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberta, Tintic Junction and Jericho. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 near mile marker 213. US Route 6 between mile markers 124 and 137, and between mile markers 146 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
